articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: Perplexity launches its own freemium ‘deep research’ product - TechCrunch
articles.description: Perplexity has become the latest AI company to release an in-depth research tool, with a new feature announced Friday. Google unveiled a similar feature
articles.content:
Perplexity has become the latest AI company to release an in-depth research tool, with a new feature announced Friday.
Google unveiled a similar feature for its Gemini AI platform in December. Then … [+2973 chars]
